sections.content:
Question:
What is the difference between CTSU and CTSU2?
Answer:
CTSU2 offers the following major enhancements
Improved noise immunity by multi-frequency measurement
Active shielding for improved water resistance in the self-capacitance method.
Simultaneous Parallel Scanning (CFC) support to shorten measurement time in mutual capacitance method (RA2L1 and RA2E1 only)
Suitable Products
RA2L1, RA2E1
